description: This file defines the NoteListFragment class, which extends Fragment and manages the display of a list of notes within an Android application. It sets up a RecyclerView with an adapter, handles user interactions like searching and navigation, and interacts with a ViewModel to observe and update note data.

classes.name: NoteListFragment
classes.description: Fragment responsible for displaying and managing a list of notes, including search functionality and navigation actions.

classes.name: NoteListFragment.NavigationHost
classes.description: Interface for navigation actions from the NoteListFragment, such as navigating to add a new note or viewing note details.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Initializes the fragment's view, sets up RecyclerView, adapters, search functionality, and navigation buttons.
